law.catch_line: A carrier that issued a high level or low level policy form prior to July 1, 2004, may not charge a ...
law.text: A carrier that issued a high level or low level policy form prior to July 1, 2004, may not charge a rate to eligible individuals under the high level or low level policy form that is greater than 200% of the rate the carrier normally would charge for the same or similar policy forms to other individuals.
